entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to as 'Harry'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is pretending to be asleep.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts and a member of Gryffindor house, who played in the match.

entities.name: kirke
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, whose ankle was near the Snitch during the match.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: The teacher who is sitting in a seat below Harry and Hermione.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as indicated by their interaction in the dormitory.
Harry is impressed by Ginny's performance in the match.
Harry feels anger towards Umbridge, who is gloating at him during the match.
